code: import axios from"axios";export const getSpaceInfo=async spaceId=>{const path='/spaces/'+spaceId;const token=localStorage.getItem('token');try{const response=await axios.get(path,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Accept:'application/json',Authorization:'Bearer '+token}});return response.data;}catch(e){console.error('getSpaceInfo Error: ',e.message);return false;}};
